name: RCMC Certified
description: Ensures fair wages and working conditions for farmers and workers in our supply chain.

name: GST Registration
description: Registered under GST for legal trade within India, enabling compliance with tax regulations.

name: FSSAI License
issuer: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India
description: Authorisation to trade, retail, and export food products as per the Food Safety and Standards Act, 2006.

name: Udyam Registration
issuer: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, Govt. of India
description: Recognized as a Micro Enterprise under MSME for availing government benefits and schemes.

name: Importer Exporter Code (IEC)
issuer: Directorate General of Foreign Trade, Govt. of India
description: IEC number for legally conducting import and export business from India.
